login_step1: 1. Open Google AI Studio in Chrome/Edge (NOT Firefox) and sign in.
login_step2:
2. IMPORTANT: Please use a Chromium-based browser (Chrome/Edge/Brave) to get the Cookie. Do not use Firefox or Safari.
Open DevTools (F12) -> Network.
Reload page -> Click the first request.
Headers -> Request Headers.
Copy the ENTIRE "Cookie" value.
login_rejected_tooltip: Login Rejected? Click here to use External Login!
login_failed_tooltip: Login Failed... Please check your login method.
reset_app_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the app? This will clear all data and restart.
star_repo: If you found it useful, give our repo a star please!
about_desc: An electron-based desktop wrapper for Google AI Studio.
account_index_help: Check browser URL: .../u/1/... -> Index is 1. Default is 0.
delete_profile_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete profile "{0}"? This action cannot be undone.
reset_app_detail: This will delete all data (cookies, settings, profiles) and restart the application.
no_update_found: You are using the latest version.
changelog_1: 1. Persistent Account Support: Now remembers your active account index (/u/1, /u/2) across sessions and navigation.
changelog_2: 2. Profile Pictures: Upload and manage custom profile avatars in Settings.
changelog_3: 3. Enhanced Login: Improved external login detection, error handling, and beta browser scanner.
changelog_4: 4. Reply Notifications: Smarter completion detection for both Playground and Chat modes.
changelog_5: 5. Auto Updates: Directly check for new releases from the About menu.
